name: Hyper Cat
description:
You play as a cat, and must jump up to eat birds that fly from the bird nests to be a happy cat. But watch out, there are birds and eagles that you must avoid. To properly deal with them, you must grab the catnip that can be carried by some of the birds. You can also jump higher while on catnip!

Use the arrow keys to move left and right, and the space-bar to jump.

Week 4 game for my rapid-prototyping class. 

Theme: New High Score

Constraints: Must have a cat, Must be black and white.
